droid-union.description: Star Wars droid labor rights site

zach_work_schedule.description: Work schedule for Zach to fix five articles in Manifold with HTML problems during work hours 10am to 2pm. Includes task breakdown, time allocation, and progress tracking.

digital_sisyphus.description: An interactive absurdist visualization of digital Sisyphus - endlessly scrolling through loading states, buffering, and progress bars that never complete. Click to push the boulder (scroll), watch it roll back down. Commentary on the futility of infinite scrolling and digital labor.

anniversary.description: Zach & Cen's surreal Lynchian anniversary chronicle at Love's Club with interactive visualizations

task-warning.description: Create a flashing warning page with the message: 'Good Morning - this is a text to let you know you still have tasks incomplete. To avoid injury or a death sentence, please complete these at your earliest convenience. Thank you! -Sportello'. Use red flashing effects, alarm-style visuals, sirens, pulsing text, and an ominous noir terminal aesthetic. Mobile-responsive with dramatic animations.

red-siren-protocol.description: Flashing red alert warning for incomplete tasks with dramatic siren effects and pulsing text message
